personas.name: Malcom Small
personas.goals:
Match candidate’s demonstrated skills to role 
 Suggest most suitable candidate to Hiring Manager 
Assess candidate for fit with team members
personas.painPoints:
Lack of candidate demonstrated skills many applicants for one position 
 Scheduling conflicts with joining Hiring Manager on interviews
 Single online source to get candidate personality and skillset

personas.name: Margie Walker
personas.goals:
Find the best candidates for job roles 
Match company needs to candidate skillsets 
Assess candidate for fit with team members
personas.painPoints:
Contacting candidates to schedule multiple-rounds of interviews 
Hiring for senior and specialty roles 
Difficulties retaining talent and minimizing turnover

navTaglines.tagline: Michael Wright wants to rule the world, so it can be measured and improved.
Michael Wright is a UX Developer based in Huntsville.
Michael Wright is a UI/UX Front-End Developer based in Huntsville.
Michael Wright wants “w” to be prounced WUH.

heroTaglines.tagline: But you can call me with a job offer
I’m not super in to labels
I would name a dog Bears or Bambi
I’ve probably looked at your work first
My brain is locked in Solution Orientation

aboutQuotes.author: Kezia Williams
aboutQuotes.quoteText: Any hand that has the power to feed you has the power to starve you.

aboutQuotes.author: Seth Godin
aboutQuotes.quoteText: Every good idea starts as a new idea.

aboutQuotes.author: Maddalyn H. Wright, when asked if she slept well
Michael P. Wright
aboutQuotes.quoteText: I believe in the power of grandiose dreams.
